title: Best source for T206 raw commons?
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Best source for T206 raw commons?
posts.post_content:
I've only been a HOF collector and am wondering where might be my best source to find T206 raw commons and minor stars?  Looking for better than beaters but maybe (if they were graded) might all be in the PSA/SGC 2 grade range, if they were graded.

Any dealers or sellers that you can suggest would be appreciated - thanks!

Jeff

You found it....

This B/S/T thread on Net54 has been the best resource that I have found.  The community is amazing and you will find many helpful members to support you along your journey. 

Start here.
